```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse);library(qdapDictionaries)
source("../tools/transform/transform_cloudmorph.R")
```

```{r}
clouds <- morph("clouds")

clouds %>%
  group_by_at(vars(word_0:word_2)) %>%
  summarize(
    n_words = n_distinct(word)
  )
```
